entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
